hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Crisis Recovery → Altcoin/BTC Pair Momentum Acceleration
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a market-wide liquidity crisis (30-day drawdown >25% with funding crisis events), the recovery phase sees ETH/BTC ratio momentum accelerate when BTC dominance breaks below a key support level, with altcoins outperforming for 14-21 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Post-liquidity crisis, risk appetite returns asymmetrically. As confidence rebuilds, capital rotates from 'safe' crypto (BTC) to higher-beta assets (alts). BTC dominance breakdown signals this rotation accelerating.
entry_conditions: Market exits STRESS regime (regime confidence >65% for NEUTRAL/BULL)
BTC dominance breaks below 50-day SMA after being above it for ≥20 days
ETH/BTC ratio makes higher low on daily chart
Aggregate altcoin volume/BTC volume ratio > 1.5 for 2 consecutive days

exit_conditions.take_profit: ETH/BTC ratio reaches 0.0625 OR +15% move in ratio from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC dominance reclaims 50-day SMA with >2% daily gain OR ETH/BTC ratio breaks recent swing low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC dominance breakdown fails to catalyze altcoin outperformance in >40% of cases OR altcoin volume remains subdued despite ratio moves.
